title: mremote does not responds to keyboard inputs
author: mathse
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior
searchbar or any other input field should accept keyboard input

## Current Behavior
after some time mremote does not accept keyboard inputs anymore, you cannot search, you cannot rename things

## Possible Solution
at this stage only restarting mremote works

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
no idea

## Context
duplicating an item and then renaming is not possible
searching is not possible...

iterations.description: Keyboard input not reaching remote connection is a focus management bug — connection panel likely loses focus after embed/tab switch without explicit SetFocus call.

notes:
AI triage (claude): Keyboard input not reaching remote connection is a focus management bug — connection panel likely loses focus after embed/tab switch without explicit SetFocus call.
Approach: After connection panel is embedded via SetParent, call SetFocus/WM_ACTIVATE on the control handle to restore keyboard input routing; similar to fix applied in #1442.
